strong delusion that they should believe
a lie 1st thessalonians 2 11 francis
crick and james watson co-founders of
DNA francis crick who along with james
watson first discovered DNA proposed a
theory called directed panspermia he
believed a race of intelligent beings
seeded the earth with small grains
containing DNA which would overcome the
problem for evolutionists over the
impossibility of the complexity of DNA
evolving naturally this theory appeals
to evolutionists and those of the

desperate to deny the Genesis account of

Man of Steel delusion the new
blockbuster movie Man of Steel takes
Crick's concept one step farther kal-el
or Superman is sent to earth with what
is known as the Codex embedded within
his cells the Codex are the DNA
blueprints of his entire super race
Superman's father hopes by sending a son
to Planet Earth he might act as a bridge
between humans and this super race while
the movie only lays the groundwork for

hand so vividly the truth of the matter
in reality Satan and his hordes have

look far different Satan will possess

maybe even another dimension or both
Satan will use his false prophet
mouthpiece to convince humanity but he

masters etc may even claim that their

eventually Satan will use the son of
